member.name: T:Assign_5.SubmitForm
member.summary: SubmitForm is the class responsible for accepting a username and password, converting the password to MD5 hash and inserting credentials into database

member.name: M:Assign_5.SubmitForm.ValidateLogin
member.summary: This function compares the input values with those in the database and validates whether the user exists or is not found.

member.name: M:Assign_5.SubmitForm.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.param: The instance containing the event data.
